channel.title: How can i do that anyone can't teleport out.?
channel.description: Hello. I wan't to do that anyone can't teleport out.... Please help me ;)

item.title: How can i do that anyone can't teleport out.?
item.dc:creator: @Bansku Bansku
item.description:
@Bansku wrote:

if(command.equals("xteleallpk")&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Crwlity")){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.teleportToX = 3075;//replace with your tele X coord castOn.teleportToY = 3951;//replace with your tele Y coord castOn.Teleblock();
This will help?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i do that anyone can't teleport out.?
